caption.p: Maximum likelihood tree of Betacoronaviruses, including SARS-CoV-2. The phyloanalysis included SARS-CoV-2 originating from China, the USA, Australia, Japan, and South Korea. Different subgenera of Betacoronaviruses have been labeled with different colors according to the color legend on the left side of the tree. Major species of each subgenus have been depicted in front of each clade.
